CustomField.description: As the data in edw cms_contract_dn is not unique we had to create a key. For each customer+country, we are getting the concatenation of effective date, agg_end_date, last_update date and pramata nbr and take the max of this key per customer
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This ID represents the concatenation of effective date, agg_end_date, last_update date and pramata nbr and the max of this key per customer with country
CustomField.label: Pramata_Max_Record_ID
